## ErrorAction type

Union type of all possible error actions. Includes predefined actions (NotifyAction, LogoutAction, RedirectAction) and CustomAction for application-specific actions.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type ErrorAction = NotifyAction | LogoutAction | RedirectAction | CustomAction;
```
**References:** [NotifyAction](./error-x.notifyaction.md)<!-- -->, [LogoutAction](./error-x.logoutaction.md)<!-- -->, [RedirectAction](./error-x.redirectaction.md)<!-- -->, [CustomAction](./error-x.customaction.md)
